trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked" /> 事件的資料。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkClickedEventArgs> specifies the text of the link that is clicked in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkClickedEventArgs>指定中按下此連結的文字<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this type.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個型別。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> named `RichTextBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>名為`RichTextBox1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked>事件。

trans-unit.source: The text of the link that is clicked in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> 控制項中所按的連結文字。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkClickedEventArgs" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkClickedEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The text specified in the `linkText` parameter can be a URL, file path, or other data that you want specified for the link being clicked.
trans-unit.target: 中指定的文字`linkText`參數可以是 URL、 檔案路徑或其他資料，您要指定給所按的連結。

trans-unit.source: Gets the text of the link being clicked.
trans-unit.target: 取得所按的連結文字。

trans-unit.source: The text of the link that is clicked in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox" /> 控制項中所按的連結文字。

trans-unit.source: The text returned by this property could be a file, URL, or other data specified by the link that is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性所傳回的文字可能是檔案、 URL 或按下的連結所指定的其他資料。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。

trans-unit.source: This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging.
trans-unit.target: 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。

trans-unit.source: To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> with <xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or appending the message to a multiline <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>.
trans-unit.target: 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox.Show%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>與<xref:System.Console.WriteLine%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或將訊息附加到多行<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextBox>。

trans-unit.source: To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox> named `RichTextBox1`.
trans-unit.target: 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox>名為`RichTextBox1`。

trans-unit.source: Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked?displayProperty=nameWithType> event.
trans-unit.target: 請確定事件處理常式關聯<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RichTextBox.LinkClicked?displayProperty=nameWithType>事件。
